Subject: Event Registration for EmPowering Women into Leadership event
Body:
Hello,

Thank you for registering for EmPowering Women into Leadership event in MS Teams. Your place is confirmed.

Please save this event in your Outlook Calendar <http://ofgemintranet/DivisionsAndCommittees/Divisions/CorporateFunctions/Communications/Events/_layouts/Ofgem.SP.EventManager/OutlookAppt.aspx?ListID=03b77051-6b49-46a9-9902-df267f6eb8f2&EventID=256> . If at any point you can no longer attend, please visit the Event Manager <http://ofgemintranet/DivisionsAndCommittees/Divisions/CorporateFunctions/Communications/Events/_layouts/Ofgem.SP.EventManager/EventList.aspx>  page and cancel your attendance.

Thank you for using our automated booking system. If you have any questions or comments, please email us at Internal Communications <mailto:internal.communications@ofgem.gov.uk> .

Subject: Internal Communications
Body:
Hello there,

 

 

Many thanks for emailing us. We check this in-box several times a day.

 

We'll do our best to get back to you with a full response within 24 hours. But if you need a more urgent reply please contact Sarah Noah, Eleanor Morgan, Monika Reichelt or Rachel Salter directly.

 

Thanks,

 

Internal Communications

Subject: EmPowering Women into Leadership event - Teams link
Body:
Join us at EmPowering Women into Leadership at Ofgem event, where you will hear from Ofgem’s many inspirational women leaders as well as our guest speaker Dr Maggie Aderin-Pocock, co-presenter of the BBC’s Sky at Night. 

 

No matter what stage you are in your career – whether you’re starting out on your career journey, considering a move into a leadership role, or in a leadership position, we believe you will take away something useful to help kickstart your development journeys in 2021.

 

Event Agenda:

 

14.30                     Introduction and welcomes: Stephanie Broadribb

14.40                     Dr Maggie Aderin-Pocock – presentation and Q&A

15.20                     Panel members’ introduction and Q&A

16.15                     Event close and next steps

 

________________________________________________________________________________ 

Microsoft Teams meeting 

Join on your computer or mobile app 

Click here to join the meeting <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/ap/t-59584e83/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fteams.microsoft.com%2Fl%2Fmeetup-join%2F19%253ameeting_ZDYxZDRiOWYtMmY5MC00MDdlLWJiNTctZTU5NzRmMzIyNDI3%2540thread.v2%2F0%3Fcontext%3D%257b%2522Tid%2522%253a%2522185562ad-39bc-4840-8e40-be6216340c52%2522%252c%2522Oid%2522%253a%25223a2d915f-f6da-4fde-99f7-fad601257bd9%2522%257d&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cdd1b2c3c362546e3ee4408d8c39c75a5%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637474424049364045%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=hm6HgTc8%2FCyhCkZEoP59MzggUtnLZikovjY85WqO6OY%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Perfect Planet 5
Body:
11min humans emit 100 times CO2 of all volcanoes
12min 1c up: atmosphere takes 7% more water for weather extremes
14min 1c up: 1 billion climate migrants from unlivable extremes
15min Senegal pj to plant great green wall 5000m of acacia to hold topsoil and store water in roots. 12min already. 15% done
20 min Amazon rf = 25 y car emission
- 2 fb pitches per min
25min Canarana rf replant 73mil trees by native youth x 200 species muvuca 20ton y 6y 30k fb fields.
70% o2 and food for 3bil ocean. Carbon sink and phytoplankton for krill
Since ind revol. Pp absorbed 50% co2 emissions 
Water and co2 and warm is acidic dissolving pp shells...40% down same as 250mya mass e of 96% of all aq life.
90% pred fish gone from overfishing
32 min Gabon protected marine area great for whales, dolphins and sharks.
3y arrest 50 ves. 1 saves 250k sharks
5 up to 30% prot ocean?
38 min less currents. Cold sinks at poles and rises warmer at eq but temp rising and freshwater in at surface
40mins cape cod tturtle watch 1 hr to save
Boston waters warming fastest pushing turtles too far north. In shock...eru for months to save some to fly south. New Eng Aq Rescue
45mins 80% en is still fos fuels. Use less, reuse or stop for renewables: wind, sun, volcanoes
48mins Morocco largest sp plant mirrors superheat liq to 400c in molten salt power steam turbines during night
2015 195countries
Amazonas 325m tower collecting data on co2
Biobanks and frozen zoo 10k
De vos, Rifkin, McCann

Sent from my Samsung Galaxy smartphone.

Subject: Quick question [OFFICIAL ]
Body:
Hi Helen,

 

Speaking of new roles, have you any clarification of our team structure as I’ve not heard anything yet from HR since our 1:1 two weeks ago?

 

Data Services have had ongoing discussions about ways of working, a charter to follow and meeting overload but I’ve not said anything as the analysts’ manager as neither Dan nor David have mentioned anything implying they are aware of any change.

 

Rory

 

From: Helen Crooks 
Sent: 03 March 2021 15:11
To: A&A Data and Digital Insights <A&ADataandDigitalInsights@ofgem.gov.uk>
Cc: Tony Cassin-Scott <Tony.Cassin-Scott@ofgem.gov.uk>; Andrew Gray <Andrew.Gray@ofgem.gov.uk>; Emma Knight <Emma.Knight@ofgem.gov.uk>
Subject: Town hall tomorrow and introducing new people [OFFICIAL ]

 

All

 

In advance of the town hall tomorrow, I wanted to introduce 3 people [some of you may have already met but not all].

 

Tony has joined as Interim Data & Digitalisation Programme Director, Andy as Data Governance Strategic Advisor and Emma is our new A&A Private Secretary.

 

I don’t intend to do a round table introduction this time but please do say hello to them, especially Emma as it is her first week.

 

Look forward to seeing you all tomorrow.

Kind regards

Helen

 

 

Helen Crooks

(she/her)

Chief Data Officer

Analysis & Assurance

10 South Colonnade, Canary Wharf, London, E14 4PU [at home]

 

www.ofgem.gov.uk <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ofgem.gov.uk%2F&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C9775ad1f00114d0a1b7508d8de56987c%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637503810870555280%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=zeeL2UNs9bUceIwI4DaQ%2BFSAsfxWOQiz54GYxc7NV%2B8%3D&reserved=0> 

 



 

Follow us on LinkedIn <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fcompany%2Fofgem&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C9775ad1f00114d0a1b7508d8de56987c%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637503810870555280%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=rdfukifgHKzMZuLCLkxsgKOBW4ZjvjtcG81nEjzN4vQ%3D&reserved=0> 

Follow us on Twitter <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitter.com%2Fofgem&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C9775ad1f00114d0a1b7508d8de56987c%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637503810870565273%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=aBSX%2FoUsLfhZT9AsesG33Y1mQt%2FWquDhKqi2W7Ho3dE%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: RE: Quick question [OFFICIAL ]
Body:
Thanks Helen,

 

I appreciate the update, if there’s anything you need me or the group to do in the interim, let me know.

 

By the way, some ideas for team names I came up with are: Solutions & Insight with Data (SID), Data Analytics & Visualisations in Energy data (DAVE) or Data-Driven Decision-Making (3DM) but it is still a work in progress so could simply be Data Analytics...

 

Rory

 

From: Helen Crooks 
Sent: 03 March 2021 17:46
To: Rory McCabe <Rory.McCabe@ofgem.gov.uk>
Cc: Steven Steer <Steven.Steer@ofgem.gov.uk>
Subject: RE: Quick question [OFFICIAL ]

 

Hi Rory

 

Apologies for not coming back to you sooner. This has been something I am thinking about but need to make sure we are doing things with the right approach / timing. Nothing has been said to anyone outside of our team, so not expecting Dan & David to know any different.

 

I will get some more time in with you [and Chris] for next week as I appreciate things could feel somewhat in limbo.

 

I will talk about the approach for data services a bit tomorrow at the town hall as we start to get a picture of what is needed for the coming year. That will inform our direct discussions on roles etc in the next few months.

 

Cc’ing Steven so that we all have the same update & I will drop Chris a line tomorrow.

 

Kind regards

Helen

 

 

From: Rory McCabe <Rory.McCabe@ofgem.gov.uk <mailto:Rory.McCabe@ofgem.gov.uk> >

Rory

Subject: Thank you for registering for the Inclusion, Equality & Diversity Conference 2021
Body:
Thank you for registering for the Inclusion, Equality & Diversity Conference 2021 - in partnership with Ofgem, sponsored by Accenture.

We look forward to you joining us on 28th and 29th April, when our keynote speakers and panellists will be discussing how to drive positive change across the energy sector.

The event will include many interactive and engaging features including for delegates to network with other delegates, speakers and partners.

You can add <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmandrillapp.com%2Ftrack%2Fclick%2F30866078%2Fd9tw8nwhjc02g.cloudfront.net%3Fp%&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce3b6ddc965ba4201fd0f08d90af98ae1%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637552892447225651%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=zdi1aranr8xDo40DbBm8Ci4ymA2%2BzBbO9WxpUmfnB6k%3D&reserved=0>  the event to your Outlook calendar in the meantime and joining instructions will be sent to you ahead of the event.

You can also find further details of the programme - including speakers as they are announced - on the Energy UK website here: https://www.energy-uk.org.uk/events/category/inclusion-equality-and-diversity-conference.html <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmandrillapp.com%2Ftrack%2Fclick%2F30866078%2Fwww.energy-uk.org.uk%3Fp%&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce3b6ddc965ba4201fd0f08d90af98ae1%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637552892447235643%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=mZ4UOlr%2FMwugJ%2BZ4kKjseamgO7UBM%2BVx9%2FOgmlUa3lI%3D&reserved=0> 

Thank you for registering and we look forward to seeing you at the event. 




System Requirements <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmandrillapp.com%2Ftrack%2Fclick%2F30866078%2Fwww.ivent-uk.com%3Fp%&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce3b6ddc965ba4201fd0f08d90af98ae1%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637552892447235643%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=IINWV5sXJGUafk5kRO1%2FjAp4%2FGxcL4fMJ1HHacbA2v4%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Changes to YouTube's Terms of Service
Body:
<https://www.gstatic.com/gumdrop/files/ytc-youtube-header-fill-w1200px-h176px-2x.png> 	
 
You're receiving this email because we're updating the YouTube Terms of Service <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnotifications.google.com%2Fg%2Fp%2FAD-FnEwmVy0DjMfg1VkVH1LfiIAT7FGxzHcrpxvKQLxaX1STdLZd90ZvPGujzi7yLUsCQbgVFAeyRZ858z4CZOm3FuRh9LJcEo9mDWPKPy46Tg&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce31757d7d36240311a4b08d91aa165fa%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637570104268640094%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=NtzRWUbRauzDZqpJW4t4s6VSJdUl72RFSoVIx4KMeh0%3D&reserved=0>  ('Terms') to clarify our terms and provide transparency to our users. The Terms were similarly updated in the United States in November 2020. These changes shouldn't significantly alter your access or use of the YouTube service. 	
 
A summary of the changes: 	

*	Facial recognition restrictions: The Terms of Service already state that you cannot collect any information that might identify a person without their permission. While this has always included facial recognition information, the new Terms make that explicitly clear. 
*	YouTube's right to monetise: YouTube has the right to monetise all content on the platform, and ads may appear on videos from channels not in the YouTube Partner Programme. 
*	Royalty payments and tax withholding: For creators entitled to revenue payments, such payments will be treated as royalties from a US tax perspective, and Google will withhold taxes where required by law. 

 
Please make sure that you read the updates to the Terms carefully. The new Terms <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnotifications.google.com%2Fg%2Fp%2FAD-FnEweVSnMwbaaWNqcTxKbuB235U6xjutxGXnb_nJMTGhoA5avwmJqZ3PwE0Cct8L-rUIfMjZGAa0I1hZyrv9OOI2MFrH-cwVY6YzENvAa2wHK&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce31757d7d36240311a4b08d91aa165fa%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637570104268640094%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2FM5X%2BFHxXR3DkoWaLPnGJluFa7KGc8rmAQxfdv0d4rw%3D&reserved=0>  will take effect on 1 June 2021 for users outside the US. By continuing to use YouTube after this date, you are agreeing to the new Terms. Please note, if you allow your child to use YouTube Kids, then you are agreeing to the new Terms on behalf of your child as well. 	
 
If you would like more information, visit our Help Centre <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnotifications.google.com%2Fg%2Fp%2FAD-FnEzI_yrvhuy3Okpi7ko8AGqQ6BgV5QP6k8vAAQblcjCTgtfLmH9QDmv-5Wkyoa-zKkClH8VRo7UgY9WWSH1PEPFoM-G6-H8rKl1r9-EFKVXwVGQdO3y4059IGfTxI-7pLbMZtcv33wT1mQ&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce31757d7d36240311a4b08d91aa165fa%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637570104268650086%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=Lwjnfnhdm%2BP9HhgxBvAZ2WK4UogZCOhCpzj%2BgjVg36g%3D&reserved=0> . 	
 

 
 
You received this mandatory email service announcement to update you about important changes to the YouTube Terms.

Subject: Steven Steer's leaving gift
Body:
Dear all 

 

We’re are in the midst of planning a farewell for Steven Steer (yes, he’s really leaving next week) and given how he is not very fond of farewells or people making a fuss of him, we’d like to get as many people as possible to contribute to his leaving do (yes, we’re those kind of colleagues). Diary invites for a speech/farewell will follow for a time slot on either 1st or 2nd of July. 

 

We’re also collecting money for a gift, and we’ve got some quite interesting things on the list to get him but we need your support and generosity to make sure it’s befitting all the hard work he’s done over the past years. 

 

So, please make sure you sign his card as soon as you can before Wednesday, 30th June, and get in as many people as you can to sign it as well. 

 

 

 

Steven’s card: https://www.groupgreeting.com/sign/22db00294801bd4 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.groupgreeting.com%2Fsign%2F22db00294801bd4&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C7220f25da9ac493dde7708d936720b5e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637600685800424527%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=bE%2BcVLJRL1yz%2FoEg0Km2mhg6Ha0SGdO12EsmG3m70CI%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Steven’s gift:  

1.	Option 1: use a debit card and use this link: https://monzo.me/elliebachvarova/10.00?d=Steven%20Steer%E2%80%99s%20leaving%20gift.%20 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmonzo.me%2Felliebachvarova%2F10.00%3Fd%3DSteven%2520Steer%25E2%2580%2599s%2520leaving%2520gift.%2520&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C7220f25da9ac493dde7708d936720b5e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637600685800434517%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=TLc%2FM1BnPHkB6PMwX%2FHZlojfCqC4HlR7nWsgJE7UKUo%3D&reserved=0> 
2.	Option 2: use a bank transfer and send money to 

	a.	Ellie Bachvarova
	b.	Sort Code: 04-00-04
	c.	Account: 01097281

 

Please forward to as many people as possible. 

 

Kind regards 

 

Ellie

 

 

 

 

Elena Bachvarova

Senior Data Programme Manager

Analysis and Assurance

10 South Colonnade

Canary Wharf

London

E14 4PU

Tel: 0207 901 3125

Subject: RE: Steven Steer - the data man is leaving
Body:
Hi Everyone

Thanks for the send-off earlier, it was very kind, the gifts are lovely and there I enjoyed reading the very nice messages in my card. Thanks.

 

As I said, sooner or later I’ll be in Glasgow. When I am I will get in touch with those of you up there so we can have drinks.

For those in London, I’ll be going for drinks from 4pm today at the Canary Wharf Brew Dog, it’ll be great if you can make it.

 

For those not sick of me yet, here’s how to get hold of me:

stevenjsteer@gmail.com <mailto:stevenjsteer@gmail.com> 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/sjsteer/ <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fin%2Fsjsteer%2F&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C3bd22103b0884e8ed70908d93c994aaf%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637607451381261976%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=0dtaqRQchX7a4HYrMFfh4QNO7aeKLzDh20RaClC6KA8%3D&reserved=0> 

07962423254

 

I wish you all the best in your futures.

Steven

PS my last bit of regulatory work. Don’t forget:  Ofgem has a monopoly over regulating monopolies. Lead by example

 

 

 

 

 

-----Original Appointment-----
From: Elena Bachvarova 
Sent: 30 June 2021 17:52
To: Elena Bachvarova; Elena Bachvarova; Greg Johnston; Jeremy Fisher; Amrita Bhatt; Rory McCabe; Chris Olsen; Emily Seto; Andrew Gray; Liz Johnston; Sergio Elizondo Gonzalez; Helen Crooks; Leo Franco; Stuart Okin; Zak Rich; Dominic Talbot; Neil Kenward; Liam Bennett; Beth Moon; Marcia Poletti; Steven Steer; Marcia Graham; David McMahon; Daya Dubey; Laurence Smith; Tajinder Singh; Heather Swan
Cc: Tony Cassin-Scott
Subject: Steven Steer - the data man is leaving
When: 01 July 2021 13:30-14:00 (UTC+00:00) Dublin, Edinburgh, Lisbon, London.
Where: 10SC Collab Space 4.21 N5; LON-HUB08

 

Dear all, 

 

Please join this farewell session for Steven, and forward to anyone who may wish to join. 

 

Ellie

Dear Rory,




Welcome to Ofgem news and communications.

 

Thank you for subscribing. You will now get updates from us based on your subscription choices. 

 

You can review, change and unsubscribe from these at any time in your preference centre <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fr1.dotdigital-pages.com%2Fp%2F1QCB-PC8-C935143873F3B1BE72G75S523968B7C06A7CE4-4HEA58%2Fchange-my-news-and-communications-preferences&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C525abd2342104689454408d9617bf021%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637648021959739333%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=jxLBI%2FDV0uUZr8fQf4%2BN1dV9SAzI1GFXzzI08avqe2E%3D&reserved=0> .

 

Did you know that all Ofgem publications can be found in our online publications library? You can filter by date, information type, industry sector or environmental scheme. Take a look here: Master publications library <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Femail.ofgem.gov.uk%2F1QCB-7F4W4-72G75S-4HDCR0-1%2Fc.aspx&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C525abd2342104689454408d9617bf021%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637648021959739333%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=T4OBVqWILnkUA%2BaLaen2psbyre3GhNAwMoFoKKZZCG4%3D&reserved=0> .

 

Thanks,

 

Ofgem Digital

Welcome to your BBC account	 
 	 
 <http://image.e.bbcmail.co.uk/lib/fe9013727761077872/m/4/welcome_email_illustration.png> 	
 	 
 	 	
Hello,

Just a quick note to say a big welcome and an even bigger thank you for registering with the BBC.

A few things you should know...


 	 1.	 We'll always keep your data safe and secure.	 
	
2.	 You can manage your details and preferences any time in your account settings <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e97c8ac980bdf81010e36c86b1d464e6f0f78ed6be635cf4a928fe7ea1d1a561f186b40876f7910f11fe7b8931cb6348950ae2a0817950bd641&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218179384%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=tBZLeE3goBbNEx%2BKjmiKI1%2BPJKhBT4rj05rKE2GZz8w%3D&reserved=0> .	 

Now that you have a BBC account you can do lots of great things including: 
	
 	 
	
 	 

 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e974dbbbd2023185e3ad3325b2dce38a5036673255915f23e6d5f4864cde0aa3dac54bd2f3d97f97b14889b4e3631eb5f61408c5c3418527076&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218179384%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YjOouBm9N8p%2BsIo%2B3gcJ3nWb0mtoduvScfZ761ywcio%3D&reserved=0> 	 
Enjoy your own personalised Sounds <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e974dbbbd2023185e3ad3325b2dce38a5036673255915f23e6d5f4864cde0aa3dac54bd2f3d97f97b14889b4e3631eb5f61408c5c3418527076&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218189376%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ZO%2F3zWdEicrmmUROquh7Je%2Bj9L1qFpnXY8F%2BeObWheg%3D&reserved=0> 	 
 	 
Get your own personalised slice of music, radio and podcasts with BBC Sounds - with recommendations and notifications tailored to you.	 
 	 
Follow the Sport you care about <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e97835e49075dc19d2133a24e65da6c6541dfd4af10a629c4c9d9d26ae206dff2b7651cdcc0ec516a4a1c427683c44b1929f67d90c53b47417e&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218189376%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=ZOql0d0HjOBCo0idorIGeLIh3RJRuX6GFoqygvfF63w%3D&reserved=0> 	 
 	 
With “My Sport” you can keep up with the latest news and results from your favourite teams and sports.	 
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e97835e49075dc19d2133a24e65da6c6541dfd4af10a629c4c9d9d26ae206dff2b7651cdcc0ec516a4a1c427683c44b1929f67d90c53b47417e&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218199368%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=V5DBKgj%2BX98yJ%2F0U%2BmwFQ1iKlL8a9lKHAXDzOepCbyI%3D&reserved=0> 	 
 	 
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e972e800f867d28b0d090a57f8b8fc5e11e8667edf731962d34085a81372e0dd65a37eaf3f81add89bcd5261524875fd9d59b101186412ff83e&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218199368%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=X0KH4r1eBoOqRkCVQ7VIUM%2B6p3WpSXlFDVKVQVtxBlY%3D&reserved=0> 	 
BBC iPlayer gets personal <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e972e800f867d28b0d090a57f8b8fc5e11e8667edf731962d34085a81372e0dd65a37eaf3f81add89bcd5261524875fd9d59b101186412ff83e&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218209364%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=tHwLpYazaAPgGP2Pc9AUixZjrHA2UMGUK7lh6rVAwbU%3D&reserved=0> 	 
 	 
As well as letting you enjoy hundreds of TV programmes, now you are signed in you can pause and pick up where you left off, even on a different device. And you can get programmes specially recommended for you.	 
 	 
Take the Weather with you <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e974134aa193e7d9a372e73bca5398126f3a76370a1e66a098c8968c19ad0e86764973172ec6fafc7146db4bd75440e1914d4122bd475a88803&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218209364%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YPKP0byq5nF1sNcuJCICTmE%2B9k1FY3wLKdxrzl%2FJwQU%3D&reserved=0> 	 
 	 
Save locations in BBC Weather and access them on any device. So wherever you are, you can quickly see what’s happening with the weather in the places that matter to you.	 
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e974134aa193e7d9a372e73bca5398126f3a76370a1e66a098c8968c19ad0e86764973172ec6fafc7146db4bd75440e1914d4122bd475a88803&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218219358%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=GmwlNcACqq1iSKhtiAYYgtITLMoRiiroIwXKVkkI3sc%3D&reserved=0> 	 
 	 
 	  	 
Plus, you can now customise your BBC homepage, vote on BBC programmes and get notifications so you never miss the things you love. And that's just for starters... now that you’re signed in we’ll remember you for next time, so you can enjoy a more personalised BBC tailored to you.
	
 	 
See what else you can do <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fclick.e.bbcmail.co.uk%2F%3Fqs%3Ddb309bd3f5052e97563af5bea218ee5e7852b1c91b7aae893132736f843f7c208daf49db5a6b1469e3cb37e809cae1ecf23e6728f31a06cddc24b953c8734849&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ce98f3c6bf4a042d4e18b08d971e433c0%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637666047218219358%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=bfsqv08h4Aswi9kRLM7TPykcoz2Mo3ld8%2B4GkJRgZGI%3D&reserved=0> 	 
 	 
All the best,

Body:

Quickly learn Azure cloud computing skills – get the audiobook	 
Get started with Azure in 21 bite-sized lessons. The popular eBook Learn Azure in a Month of Lunches is now available as a free audiobook. Follow step-by-step instructions to build your first project in Azure and be productive immediately. When you finish the lessons, you’ll be well on your way to Azure mastery. Learn how to:

*	Use core Azure infrastructure and platform services – including how to choose which service for which task.
	
	
*	Plan appropriately for availability, scale and security while considering cost and performance.
	
	
*	Work with key technologies, including Kubernetes and serverless computing, AI and machine learning and the Internet of Things. 

Reinforce your new skills with labs and exercises, using project files that you can access in GitHub. Also download the free eBook Learn Azure in a Month of Lunches <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Femails.microsoft.com%2FMTU3LUdRRS0zODIAAAF_oNGYCkL5Ge-3Lh-oBajkIm4vi87Nrs-Sq4WqokSFGloNYOk8efwZgX2J6DhK_yX5Uu9ESP4%3D&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4a5303ab55d44b51f51808d97bfe21db%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637677153686754036%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=5LV4D3KKTQ6HbByiatRMuyK7%2FRLW3cwaEyr46tUIGNE%3D&reserved=0> .

Science City | A.C. Grayling: Learning from The Age of Genius


Wednesday 22 September 2021 | 19.00 - 20.00


Thank you for registering to attend this online event <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4MjEwXzEyODc1MTBfNzMyNA%26l%3D7c51b4ce-1a1a-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DPre-visit%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AScienceCityA.C.Graylingpre-visit22.09.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D22817&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4704ab5d09d642ad7fd808d97dd9e0aa%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637679196998308936%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=WfW9VqMEUChN%2FYOU1CqWtmOtOpdxuhU40VN3MwEdLSE%3D&reserved=0> , which is part of the Science Museum's 'Science City' events series, in collaboration with The Royal Society.


How to join the event


Please log in <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4MjEwXzEyODc1MTBfNzMyNA%26l%3D7d51b4ce-1a1a-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DPre-visit%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AScienceCityA.C.Graylingpre-visit22.09.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D22817&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4704ab5d09d642ad7fd808d97dd9e0aa%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637679196998318931%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=%2FYCQUjVWFJiavWY%2FbTzpWrc7MnBpL7pJf6gTs3Mn9mY%3D&reserved=0>  to your museum account which will provide you with a link to join the event under the "Virtual Events" section.


Need help?


Our contact centre will be open till 19.30 tonight and 09.00-17.00 on all other days.

Please call 033 0058 0058 if you need assistance with anything.

________________________________


How you can support the Science Museum Group


Our mission is to inspire the next generation with science and we need your help to continue this work.

Support us by making a donation Wonderlab tickets on sale


Think like a scientist at Wonderlab: The Equinor Gallery


As well as general admission tickets, tickets for Wonderlab <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4MjU4XzEyODc1MTBfNzE3NA%26l%3Df15b5b28-501c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253A23SeptOnSaleECD(D)%252C23.09.21%26utm_term%3DWordFly%2520%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D22834&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cf9d695786c754cbef67108d97e74e519%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637679862816091461%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=rcEOlnKOMdiIxvzCYFWEFwIYs8MBQSHw2ukSUZ%2FtSSc%3D&reserved=0>  are now on sale from October half-term until February 2022.

Chris Hadfield in conversation with Professor Lucie Green


Join us on Wednesday 29 September in the IMAX cinema


Ahead of the release of his debut thriller novel 'The Apollo Murders', astronaut Chris Hadfield joins Professor Lucie Green <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4MjU4XzEyODc1MTBfNzE3NA%26l%3Dff5b5b28-501c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253A23SeptOnSaleECD(D)%252C23.09.21%26utm_term%3DWordFly%2520%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D22834&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cf9d695786c754cbef67108d97e74e519%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637679862816171414%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=8%2FN5rVktAXpt%2FOzl60aBcvfFgY1hyMVfGR2Ea%2BYEjxQ%3D&reserved=0>  to discuss his life and career in spaceflight. 

At this event <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4MjU4XzEyODc1MTBfNzE3NA%26l%3Dff5b5b28-501c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253A23SeptOnSaleECD(D)%252C23.09.21%26utm_term%3DWordFly%2520%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D22834&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cf9d695786c754cbef67108d97e74e519%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637679862816171414%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=8%2FN5rVktAXpt%2FOzl60aBcvfFgY1hyMVfGR2Ea%2BYEjxQ%3D&reserved=0> , hosted on-stage by Professor Lucie Green, Chris Hadfield recalls his past experiences from becoming the top graduate of the US test pilot school in 1988 to becoming one of the world’s most recognised science communicators.

The event will also include an extensive audience Q&A, with plenty of opportunity to put your own questions to Colonel Hadfield.

Amazônia opens today at the Science Museum


Award-winning photographer Sebastião Salgado's new breathtaking exhibition opens today


Get inside the mind of internationally renowned photographer Sebastião Salgado and witness "his most moving project yet" - The Guardian.

For seven years, Salgado worked with twelve different indigenous communities to create this magnificent photography project. The result is over 200 powerful black-and-white photographs that uncover Salgado’s vision of the Amazon when the forest is approaching a crucial tipping point in the fight against climate change.

Don't miss this stunning exhibition, book your ticket <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4NjQxXzEyODc1MTBfNzIzNA%26l%3D9976bf68-0f2c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AAmazoniaopens-Events13.10.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D23277&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cb31517b2911e49b4516d08d98e337e2b%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637697174093751544%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=ZFjTxow6letAmFz9bFrZH%2F3VW%2F4lWgAHVsWLRvbVjAM%3D&reserved=0>  for Amazônia today.

Introducing Amazônia


The start of a new blog series


To celebrate opening day, we have launched a new blog series <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4NjQxXzEyODc1MTBfNzIzNA%26l%3D9c76bf68-0f2c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AAmazoniaopens-Events13.10.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D23277&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cb31517b2911e49b4516d08d98e337e2b%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637697174093761544%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=XtKyHo0dgqPeTfEuZ9heUWiuv68RpBZiCkiH8ThNw%2Bc%3D&reserved=0>  that delves deeper into the mind of Sebastião Salgado to uncover the unparalleled beauty of the Amazon rainforest. 

The first blog post <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4NjQxXzEyODc1MTBfNzIzNA%26l%3D9d76bf68-0f2c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AAmazoniaopens-Events13.10.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D23277&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cb31517b2911e49b4516d08d98e337e2b%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637697174093771527%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=NTOkRSqVsItONAoFv49FHFonW6xnohHoJ5M2Z3d8%2Bv0%3D&reserved=0>  offers a preview of the captivating sights and sounds you can expect in this exhibition.

Read here <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4NjQxXzEyODc1MTBfNzIzNA%26l%3D9e76bf68-0f2c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AAmazoniaopens-Events13.10.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D23277&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cb31517b2911e49b4516d08d98e337e2b%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637697174093771527%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=Qo3YUIyhzIXos%2Fn1JsXSnTVfl4DUFwWA0KB6Lla05oI%3D&reserved=0>

Amazônia by Sebastião Salgado


An exceptional book to accompany a stunning exhibition


Published by TASCHEN, this extraordinary book <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4NjQxXzEyODc1MTBfNzIzNA%26l%3Da076bf68-0f2c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AAmazoniaopens-Events13.10.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D23277&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cb31517b2911e49b4516d08d98e337e2b%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637697174093781528%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=MCDON3gScFu0gzyaV1okRm0TLxaJCxxH8himyNeISCg%3D&reserved=0>  charts Salgado's seven-year journey through the Amazon as he photographed this extraordinary region.

You can pre-order this book <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4NjQxXzEyODc1MTBfNzIzNA%26l%3Da176bf68-0f2c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AAmazoniaopens-Events13.10.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D23277&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cb31517b2911e49b4516d08d98e337e2b%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637697174093791526%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=Aes%2FvulTkk0wcAQUTYmySSlNbyAM8FT7fIUETBiknTY%3D&reserved=0>  from our online shop.

Pre-order a copy <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4NjQxXzEyODc1MTBfNzIzNA%26l%3Da276bf68-0f2c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AAmazoniaopens-Events13.10.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D23277&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cb31517b2911e49b4516d08d98e337e2b%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637697174093791526%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=nCJsVMs9vLhstmAkrmGlehIEImWjaUC0jcYJiXPFn7w%3D&reserved=0>

What makes you tick?


We want to make sure that we are giving you the best experience possible, so we’ve written a short questionnaire <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI4NjQxXzEyODc1MTBfNzIzNA%26l%3Da376bf68-0f2c-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLAA%253AAmazoniaopens-Events13.10.21%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D23277%26wf-CrmSubscriberId%3D3229815&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cb31517b2911e49b4516d08d98e337e2b%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637697174093801517%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=KuJure3b6XFS%2BoGR5tWKgfyLR6CuqmjkBm%2FaGh8iinI%3D&reserved=0>  to find out your views on culture, the arts and the Science Museum itself.

Your details
We’ll use this data to help send you Science Museum news that you’d be most interested in. We will also analyse and store it to help us understand more about our museum visitors. Subject: av text [OFFICIAL ]
Body:
SQL QUESTIONS

Q1. What is the difference between UNION & UNION ALL in SQL?

Answer:   Union returns discrete or unique set of records whereas union all allows duplicates

       

 

 

Q2. What is CAST function in SQL?

Answer:

This is used to force the variable type e.g. real decimals to integer

 

Q3. What is PARTITION BY function in SQL?

Answer:

This is used to group a larger dataset into clusters which helps with speed and memory issues.

A common use would be to split a large dataset into year, month, date for fast retrieval.

 

Name

Sport

Adam

Cricket

Brad

Soccer

Kathy

Baseball

Dimi

Tennis

Person

Transport

Kathy

Car

Dimi

Bus

Eric

Bike

Faith

Train

 

Q4. What is the difference between LEFT JOIN and LEFT OUTER JOIN (please refer to the tables X & Y below for explanation). Please use the empty table below to display the outputs if required.

 

 

 

Table X                                  Table Y          

Answer: 

Left join is always an outer join and returns X plus any records from Y where the key field exists in X

In this case, Adam and Brad with null transport and Kathy and Dimi with Car/Bus

 

 

Name

Sport

Transport

 

 

 

 

 

Adam

Cricket

null

 

 

 

 

 

Brad

Soccer

null

 

 

 

 

 

Kathy

Baseball

Car

 

 

 

 

 

Dimi

Tennis

Bus

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Q5. Write a SQL query to find the second highest score and the Name of the person for that score from the Table below.

Name

Score

Adam

101

Brad

123

Kathy

99

Dimi

56

 

 

 

Table X

Answer:

Select Score,Name from X order – descending and pick the second entry or skip the first

 

 

 

 

 

Q6. What is the difference between List and Dictionary in Python?

Answer: 

List e.g. [1,2,3] contains multiple entries that can be of different type and are mutable, i.e. you can edit them.

Dictionary e.g. {a:1,b:2,c:3} contains item pairs of key and value entries. These can also be edited, removed or new entries added.

 

Q7. Referring to the DataFrame (df) below, write a Python command (preferably 1 liner) to create a new DataFrame (new_df) to contain only rows where Action is ‘ValidData’ AND Status is ‘Yes’



 

Answer:  

new_df = df.where([df.Action == ‘ValidData’,df.Status=’Yes’])

Alternatively, you can drop the rows where condition is not met 


Q8. Using the same DataFrame (df), write a Python command (preferably 1 liner) to replace Status column values to ‘Audit’ WHERE Action column values are ‘NeedsReview’



Answer: 

df.Status[df.Action==’NeedsReview’] = ‘Audit’

 

 

Q9. Using the same dataset as above (df), how do we get the number of times each country (Country of Origin) is appearing in the data?

Answer: 

 

df.groupby([Country]).info()

or any other method that lists the result from the groupby object like values, etc.

 

 




 

Q10. Assuming, we are trying to achieve LEFT JOIN between the two given DataFrames (df1 and df2), write a Python command for the same, and write the expected output in the empty table below.

df1                                             df2

Name

Tax

Adam

5050

Brad

89

Tim

1256

Adam

1900

Name

Age

Adam

21

Brad

17

Kathy

43

Dimi

30

  

 

 

 

Answer: 

df1.merge(df2, on=Name,type=’left’)

 

Name

Age

Tax

 

 

 

 

 

Adam

21

5050

 

 

 

 

 

Brad

17

89

 

 

 

 

 

Kathy

43

Null

 

 

 

 

 

Dimi

30

Null

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Q11. What is a Filter and a Slicer in Power BI?

Answer: 

These are tools on the right-hand pane that can take the dataset and present a subset of it in the dashboard that either shows the rows that obey the condition or the particular field of interest.

Output of filter can be the whole table if it fits or a drop-down option.

 

Q12. How can we prevent visuals in Power BI dashboard from changing / keep them static while applying drill down to other visuals?

Answer:

The default setting as you build a dashboard is to link the items so a total will change if a filter list chooses different values. You can change this is the ellipsis top right corner settings to be independent and hold a value even if the other items change

 

Q13. What is the input file size limitation in Power BI? 

Answer: 

Don’t know

Q14: Mention a few common DAX functions you have used in Power BI

Answer:   

I’ve mainly used PowerBI ‘out of the box’ but did do a course on the DAX language used for expressions and the M commands used in the query editor but, other than having their command lists to reference list, I have not used them extensively 

Q15. You have two ropes coated in an oil to help them burn. Each rope will take exactly 1 hour to burn all the way through. You cannot cut the ropes; and you do not have a timer.

Only with a lighter to ignite the ropes, how can you measure exactly 45 minutes?

 

Answer:If I can light them separately, I would light the first bent exactly in two so it burns out in 30 minutes and then light the second folded in four to mark 15 minutes.

Otherwise, I would tie a knot half way and then half again in one rope and stop the clock at the third knot and would not need the second rope.

 

 

[]

Subject: Link to the video 'Understanding the ghost particle' and to register for next event
Body:
Hello!

You are receiving this email because you had registered for our particle physics event last week, ‘Understanding the Ghost particle’.

 

The video of the talk is now available to watch via our YouTube channel: https://youtu.be/QNhWoaFfBmM <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2FQNhWoaFfBmM&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C2e483d86eec64f881b9608d9a5e3b984%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637723219759135971%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=YgtMn%2Bni3CGQ6BfYneJvyXBUQH6hfqo8fiMR%2FDMSV24%3D&reserved=0>  

Feel free to share and subscribe to our channel.

 

You may be interested to join us on December 9th, at 5pm GMT, for the annual Particle Physics Christmas Lecture, which would normally be an event for Oxford Physics alumni, but as this year will be online, it is open to all.

We are delighted that our guest speaker will be Prof Dr Allen Caldwell <mailto:https://www.mpp.mpg.de/en/about-us/organization/directors/prof-dr-allen-caldwell> , from the Max Planck Institute. We are working on the last details and title, but in the meantime, would be great if you save the date and register your interest <mailto:https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/the-particle-physics-christmas-lecture-2021-tickets-209785633477> , as places are limited. Booking closes on the day at 12 noon GMT.

 

Any questions or suggestions, as always, very welcome, so feel free to write to me.

 

As always, you can read more and book for many other events via our website <mailto:https://www.physics.ox.ac.uk/events> , and engage with our fantastic community via social media (links on my signature).

 

Have a lovely weekend,

Best regards,

Val

 

Val Crowder – Alumni Relations & Social Media Manager

Department of Physics – University of Oxford

Clarendon Laboratory – Parks Rd

Oxford OX1 3PU – England – UK

valeria.crowder@physics.ox.ac.uk <mailto:valeria.crowder@physics.ox.ac.uk> 

www.physics.ox.ac.uk/alumni <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.physics.ox.ac.uk%2Falumni&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C2e483d86eec64f881b9608d9a5e3b984%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637723219759135971%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=0Xrz4FTDfiqh9EJqMKevZLRj5YY0q7oUZydE4uTIwII%3D&reserved=0> 

Tel +44 (0) 1865 282065

 <mailto:https://www.instagram.com/physics_oxford/?hl=en>  <mailto:https://twitter.com/oxfordphysics>   <mailto:https://www.linkedin.com/company/university-of-oxford-department-of-physics/?viewAsMember=true>   <mailto:https://www.tiktok.com/@physicsoxford>   <mailto:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYwVpRH-VqWfySKZntMhP9A>   <mailto:https://www.facebook.com/PhysicsOxford>  

 

Please note: Due to the current outbreak of coronavirus all of our Special events and Lectures have been moved online until further notice.

Most of us are working remotely, so there may be delays and/or some activities may not be possible during this time. We hope you can understand and bear with us while this challenging time is here.

Please note the department is now closed for public until further notice following Government guidance (only key staff and some research carry on).

We apologise in advance for any inconvenience caused.

 

Confidentiality Notice: This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain confidential and privileged information.  Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited.  If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the original message.

Subject: FW: Link to the video 'Understanding the ghost particle' and to register for next event
Body:
Hello all,

A quick note on the previous email (see below): a few of you have come back to me saying that the registation link is not working, but we are also getting lots of others registering without an issue, so here is the link again:

https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/the-particle-physics-christmas-lecture-2021-tickets-209785633477 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.eventbrite.co.uk%2Fe%2Fthe-particle-physics-christmas-lecture-2021-tickets-209785633477&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C65ca7ca169914ca668d808d9a5f0bc78%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637723275678014012%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=yrU8p1efV5%2BssCXok4Fj1UwqqCbX41gc4CWSO5HObqc%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Apologies for any inconvenience, 

Best regards

Val

Subject: FW: Link to the video 'Understanding the ghost particle' and to register for next event 

 

Hello all,

A quick note on the previous email (see below): a few of you have come back to me saying that the registation link is not working, but we are also getting lots of others registering without an issue, so here is the link again:

https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/the-particle-physics-christmas-lecture-2021-tickets-209785633477 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.eventbrite.co.uk%2Fe%2Fthe-particle-physics-christmas-lecture-2021-tickets-209785633477&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C65ca7ca169914ca668d808d9a5f0bc78%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637723275678014012%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=yrU8p1efV5%2BssCXok4Fj1UwqqCbX41gc4CWSO5HObqc%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Apologies for any inconvenience, 

Best regards

Val

 

 

From: Valeria Crowder 
Sent: 12 November 2021 13:51
Subject: Link to the video 'Understanding the ghost particle' and to register for next event 

 

Hello!

You are receiving this email because you had registered for our particle physics event last week, ‘Understanding the Ghost particle’.

 

The video of the talk is now available to watch via our YouTube channel: https://youtu.be/QNhWoaFfBmM <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fyoutu.be%2FQNhWoaFfBmM&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C65ca7ca169914ca668d808d9a5f0bc78%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637723275678024009%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=fD5eh30lZAVxfSpsP1nGuxtMdQxs61kxet6MMH4zC74%3D&reserved=0>  

Feel free to share and subscribe to our channel.

 

You may be interested to join us on December 9th, at 5pm GMT, for the annual Particle Physics Christmas Lecture, which would normally be an event for Oxford Physics alumni, but as this year will be online, it is open to all.

We are delighted that our guest speaker will be Prof Dr Allen Caldwell <mailto:https://www.mpp.mpg.de/en/about-us/organization/directors/prof-dr-allen-caldwell> , from the Max Planck Institute. We are working on the last details and title, but in the meantime, would be great if you save the date and register your interest <mailto:https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/the-particle-physics-christmas-lecture-2021-tickets-209785633477> , as places are limited. Booking closes on the day at 12 noon GMT.

 

Any questions or suggestions, as always, very welcome, so feel free to write to me.

 

As always, you can read more and book for many other events via our website <mailto:https://www.physics.ox.ac.uk/events> , and engage with our fantastic community via social media (links on my signature).

 

Have a lovely weekend,

Best regards,

Val

 

Val Crowder – Alumni Relations & Social Media Manager

Clarendon Laboratory – Parks Rd

 <mailto:https://www.instagram.com/physics_oxford/?hl=en>  <mailto:https://twitter.com/oxfordphysics>   <mailto:https://www.linkedin.com/company/university-of-oxford-department-of-physics/?viewAsMember=true>   <mailto:https://www.tiktok.com/@physicsoxford>   <mailto:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYwVpRH-VqWfySKZntMhP9A>   <mailto:https://www.facebook.com/PhysicsOxford>  

 

Please note: Due to the current outbreak of coronavirus all of our Special events and Lectures have been moved online until further notice.

Most of us are working remotely, so there may be delays and/or some activities may not be possible during this time. We hope you can understand and bear with us while this challenging time is here.

Please note the department is now closed for public until further notice following Government guidance (only key staff and some research carry on).

We apologise in advance for any inconvenience caused.

Subject: Wellness hub is doubling in size! ?????
Body:
<https://ablink.news.perkbox.com/ss/o/oCXyxM_5NV1pDShQTVqsdg/3h9/b9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg/ho.gif> 
90 new pieces of audio and video to help you kick start your wellbeing goals. 
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4izX4K2Q3_o0jXAYX9HXc2fs%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh6%2FZB9-Sk_QQNplsnc45nDFpPEFZ-rdLZ9tH1i6MnRDDaE&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276208940%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=ZWS3Ji4fgZxCgwoQ9XhJFrJZer145huAyWNdlQYgDOQ%3D&reserved=0> 		.	 
	 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4izX4K2Q3_o0jXAYX9HXc2fs%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh7%2FYb9R7sc8qQZV9JbIyuin0nuYsraVthinFSpFXr6cqL4&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276218918%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=J5p0ZD4WDDTEPT3iDirQyw%2Bjwy%2FApQkHUbPllrhp7T4%3D&reserved=0> 	
Wellness hub is doubling in size! 	
 <https://cdn.brandfolder.io/YBQM1DTL/at/qc5bk6-brrc4o-7qz6ih/EX_Platform_-_In_Life_sans_icons.png> 	
Between now and Christmas, we’ll be adding 90 new pieces of content to Wellness hub — gifting you more than 30 hours of new audio and video to help you kick off your wellbeing goals for the new year. 	
Check it out <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4iz8loUgpz41lZ38HSjF8dPA%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh8%2FvandbDt2bt2obWI5UJqrm6Iuhb0Cn-KDTMIsDpctNsU&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276228912%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=wh%2FcKOVdIl7aekdzOkRCt%2FWUNOm4LxbwB0PZHAnDaL8%3D&reserved=0>  	
Here's what we've been working on... 	
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4iz8loUgpz41lZ38HSjF8dPA%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh9%2Fn8uVVOV8RFqHuPYXLJYjeodZkGpaAjyjCheN_3qAiqg&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276228912%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=vQE%2BI%2BRSyBzPSVzKxPBN71VkjceNAOL9ggRAlJa6OUc%3D&reserved=0> 	
	Webinars from wellbeing experts 		
We’ve launched a new category called ‘Webinars’ where you’ll find recordings of our past Perkbox Live sessions. Find a range of topics like mental health, nutrition, financial wellbeing and sleep. There are also 5-10 minute highlight clips. 		
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2Fs1lTZR61m0qd-dyKIw5gjKUlTlmZmmLc_OuZN27MpY_fp28-i7zAj-1AGTqbFJQWJI7OmBJlbSkILLuBU47vnu1mGJjsTCMMzvpqGk4dkF4%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh10%2FXGBFKHuFI4gerV7NE2Iv-96QNTM-Ol02CrwUCKoRbsQ&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276238905%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=EMbeH%2FzZH8oWTPjbJcKKkrB8sEWz2iyvfd%2FRPC69mUs%3D&reserved=0> 	
	Live: Introduction to Mindfulness Series 		
Set yourself up for a more mindful festive period. Join Debbie from Being Mindful as she introduces us to mindfulness over six 10-minute sessions. Every Wednesday for six weeks at 1:30pm GMT, starting from 24th November. Register here. <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2Fs1lTZR61m0qd-dyKIw5gjKUlTlmZmmLc_OuZN27MpY_fp28-i7zAj-1AGTqbFJQWJI7OmBJlbSkILLuBU47vnu1mGJjsTCMMzvpqGk4dkF4%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh11%2FVQUR-vPq9oxRbN5AXA_HxRIDzPakFWGFzhpsMR8j5FE&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276238905%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=0eU%2BzeTFfZWAWwFjmLs2IFGPMLX1U%2BcNFj2abYlz%2FGQ%3D&reserved=0> 

If that time doesn’t work for you, the recordings will be available for you to access whenever suits! 		
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4iz8loUgpz41lZ38HSjF8dPA%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh12%2Fn0z6nYyCe-AGhbnaezcP3ZTJJdL5JOaxxzMJiCxyBro&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276248893%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=%2BM9ybdTsQps7UUBGdGehHP1glE%2BTl860y2pf6PmwNCw%3D&reserved=0> 	
	Introducing Spiritune 		
Using a combination of neuroscience and music therapy, Spiritune has developed music tracks that are designed to shift you from one mental state to another. Simply choose the track most appropriate, hit play and feel yourself shift in the direction you need to be. 		
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4iz8loUgpz41lZ38HSjF8dPA%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh13%2F8IG7MuKKO4beTP7UfbNjmyG2-HwprZn0-3wibhiuzFE&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276248893%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=XaYrv56oxeeDoGo1r3cstQ9yjme87lE4MH%2F0kiubXdg%3D&reserved=0> 	
	New Sleep Stories and Meditations 		
Sleep stories and meditation content are our most popular categories! Enjoy 5 new sleep stories and 8 new 1-2 minute meditations from our friends at Sanctuary. Shorter meditations are perfect for filling those short gaps between meetings! Available from 2nd December. 		
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4iz8loUgpz41lZ38HSjF8dPA%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh14%2Fxb5brjnS2JKRy0JuZ-LN3b5B-kMr7_iy2DVxZqpCNmI&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276258898%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=K7vCKNWOQDN4mSdPN3WtfMFHFn8X50XcrhdnYZsUMu8%3D&reserved=0> 	
	Get moving with pilates 		
Pilates has been our most requested type of fitness content since we launched Wellness hub. Join Claire, an award winning instructor who is providing 20 new videos, ranging from 13 - 40 min in length for beginners, intermediate and advanced levels. Coming later this month. 		
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4iz8loUgpz41lZ38HSjF8dPA%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh15%2FPZbZdPrxFOrpY6CgyhQgXRwT3JBdyICctP7RWoMNeUc&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276258898%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=5pKv2lD3pIVUU3mguRJpbEJldNgR8zBlyHzEoqpoYTE%3D&reserved=0> 	
	Mindfulness for parents and children 		
Parenting can be a stressful experience for anyone and an area of life where mindfulness can make a big difference. Children can benefit from mindfulness too, with the simple practice of bringing gentle and accepting awareness of the present moment. Available early December. 		
 	 
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2FdZTZ5YYmObE5pZnv-0OEK1qp0Ax6FdWNodbI2Scg4kmjpbILYXLPiSpfAYOjB0nQ%2F3h9%2Fb9m7EpMMRtao5Qv6lb-0jg%2Fh16%2FxWZ00Yv3ot5OdCOloHES5axtFUsOC3rA_LvW6UeWa8c&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4f9b3f6672e246ced55f08d9ae89996e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637732728276268890%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=hyyNQf15LMRd%2BY8k7wDbaj9F9IfDeVxfwHBFcZXhWBc%3D&reserved=0> Subject: Updates to YouTube's Terms of Service
Body:
<https://www.gstatic.com/gumdrop/files/ytc-youtube-header-fill-w1200px-h176px-2x.png> 	
 
On 5 January 2022, we're updating our Terms of Service ("Terms") to help clarify and make it easier to understand what to expect as you use the service. These changes won't affect the way you use YouTube. You can review a summary of the changes and the updated Terms here <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnotifications.google.com%2Fg%2Fp%2FAD-FnEyKyTIEpNwwSDzYi3nIRiQ_p6IgdIsEkR3dVywwfDMLfsIqWb5D_1a8CVAMbrtcvVaOkiFuZa32lHePJsxWriUjByEwUbTqDZwc1cGaXYZ4_JgxPDRBPWhaPcsza4pu4BXE9Q&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbe0b19b4d87e4fb662c208d9b07c7877%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637734870910755478%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=nkyIfgq3H5sPIR8ThpNMhSXSPrzmkTAiKYl5aPL6s2A%3D&reserved=0> . 

 
At a glance, this update covers: 

*	More clarity on what to expect: We're providing more transparency about how we develop, improve and update our service, including more details about why we make changes and updates and the advanced notice that we provide to you. 
*	General updates for improved readability: While our Terms remain a legal document, we've done our best to make them easier to understand. This includes reorganising some sections (such as Account Suspension and Termination) and rewording others (such as Changing this Agreement). 
*	Inclusion of the Community Guidelines strikes process: Your use of YouTube has always been subject to the Community Guidelines and its strikes process, but we're now explicitly including the Community Guidelines strikes <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnotifications.google.com%2Fg%2Fp%2FAD-FnExUvsm3-ca7VgboO8MLZX-stVeC0VxF-IPn3ceyliPKil5XmoDAvVEqRhkg2KjnXttDb2CCRyb7AiHoVldGceYxaZJ8PeEQmRR4ZUiIoJNVB9YHJDvsPz64m11gcAwrtDUq2Q&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbe0b19b4d87e4fb662c208d9b07c7877%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637734870910765469%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=gLTpFii5A7IH%2FcqPbclhtRsY%2BLWGTlTTOLkBfEDXHt4%3D&reserved=0>  information in the Terms to increase transparency. There are no changes to how Community Guidelines strikes operate, or when a channel or content might receive a strike. 

 
Please make sure that you read the updates to the Terms <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnotifications.google.com%2Fg%2Fp%2FAD-FnEz_fK5sZEsuXS_bhpbn0Xzq3t7C8wymdnp2zUIbt9akN7P-8So4MnzW-AbmrxCzkmItZAln4pepJlfw8DVle4d9-HSEgrYNq35kRjFi4ejjIEqwZ2DY9nIo9yojwlR9NmtH9A&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbe0b19b4d87e4fb662c208d9b07c7877%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637734870910765469%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=bHjtIyoKUj0kqQe0NfysAjNM0yJztdA6TmtQvAQCtQs%3D&reserved=0> . By continuing to use YouTube after this date, you are agreeing to the updated Terms. Note: If you allow your child to use YouTube Kids or manage your child's use of YouTube through Family Link <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnotifications.google.com%2Fg%2Fp%2FAD-FnEzz5rQ7afD9WSztOpbQ7Xa8BcgiKezAvfBzCBl03AHofvA5-Mp9vQrMAz5zOWcnUEFVWgoscSEKDkYC0eKmCa8u0G9AOTkir1s5Hmxzy2glZ9PphHihv1zgIQOSNitO&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbe0b19b4d87e4fb662c208d9b07c7877%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637734870910775460%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=vIuwOn3vttR9SgBkbWUbYRoxCifeVz2I5O%2F%2B5jVL3eQ%3D&reserved=0> , take a moment to talk to them about these changes. 

 
Thank you for being part of our global community! 

 

 
 
Help Centre <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnotifications.google.com%2Fg%2Fp%2FAD-FnEyA_JqiOEy0n3jRvO_sU3OGNBsRbsnRq52x2o8_57ONDxAuffqkvz-hEo_4XSSVjwV02ZgqLwk2SMfcNjh9Z-QkGR9la2OPtHNLpUtMtuiizSi6lwMdCs-wuBE&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbe0b19b4d87e4fb662c208d9b07c7877%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637734870910785455%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=O%2FMvS%2FUEwOydszgNIUfpyf85FFPlZP7KWiDqCuGM5NE%3D&reserved=0> • Email options <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnotifications.google.com%2Fg%2Fp%2FAD-FnEzdfgsY9FbWnEqqKvPBUgJtPyQRGzlJiHiSnoWZuRKel3hyCF6oWZ2xVHkDq_IjUTW205E-P1WcYU1YTNVBBBOvTY9AAUXK6YfvtZGloeDUlPoaFXXEu_AKWCoIqSc_SNz8vUSifixlI8yc2kwXuYznNRj9tWz1aZeJNv15l0M-3dQT9ktKfioqdVQfOoJveA&data=04%7C01%7CRory.McCabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbe0b19b4d87e4fb662c208d9b07c7877%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637734870910785455%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=cyiypzCDFxZzgfxiPZzj54hh2FTS0HlH5OkkTiu0KBo%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: We made a mistake! Here is what happened
Body:
<https://ablink.news.perkbox.com/ss/o/oCXyxM_5NV1pDShQTVqsdg/3hc/nAUGjtbqRs2rO2f1aGpK8A/ho.gif> 
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4izX4K2Q3_o0jXAYX9HXc2fs%2F3hc%2FnAUGjtbqRs2rO2f1aGpK8A%2Fh5%2FtRKiERLOfQ8IRsQrgA2iF0vxcvDhUk_81T4_srgAI2I&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ced38784472ac427fb9d208d9b0d451f5%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637735248217387193%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=oYX3ep5VkBz2Op4HeYbpbFcgmwMSaJdOv%2BW0b23Es1w%3D&reserved=0> 		.	 
	 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2F_vmsSH5hH_odqqAzDSYz288PZstT3WW6xVzfczdb4izX4K2Q3_o0jXAYX9HXc2fs%2F3hc%2FnAUGjtbqRs2rO2f1aGpK8A%2Fh6%2Fgv1OIs0tCfsnfAuG73860ThiH8XBNBRix84nO38972E&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ced38784472ac427fb9d208d9b0d451f5%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637735248217397184%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=5LS5OeLTc0x0yJtjYZMLYy9CwUNT69cz8pgOgUVMEvE%3D&reserved=0> 	
Hi Rory, 

We understand the irony in emailing you to apologise for...emailing you. But we truly are sorry! 

We recently had some technical issues that may have caused you to receive a few marketing emails you shouldn’t have. We’d like to apologise for this and any annoyance it caused. 

Rest assured this has now been fixed and we’ve taken every step possible to prevent it from happening again. 

All the best, 
Perkbox 	
 	 
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fablink.news.perkbox.com%2Fss%2Fc%2FdZTZ5YYmObE5pZnv-0OEK1qp0Ax6FdWNodbI2Scg4kmjpbILYXLPiSpfAYOjB0nQ%2F3hc%2FnAUGjtbqRs2rO2f1aGpK8A%2Fh7%2FlfxLD3gL0Dl6IePryqcGnJrgsQBtZrOi9xbu85igdtE&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ced38784472ac427fb9d208d9b0d451f5%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637735248217407179%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=XXRcmDujO%2Bxx2%2FIU8eSis8wd18IPWwmMVaW2gwWUDGo%3D&reserved=0> Science Fiction: Voyage to the Edge of Imagination 


Take off in October 2022


Welcome to the world of Science Fiction <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI5NzMyXzEyODc1MTBfNzI1MQ%26l%3D60476666-f751-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLDB%253AScienceFictionScotland%252C30.11.21%26utm_term%3DWordFly%2520%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D24309&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C9fd170ea3a1d4d78829108d9b41b8669%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637738852584278370%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=c63JQBIIdjG9%2FPOghrIQhirYMNRpApCVIQkgn5ciGWk%3D&reserved=0> . In this immersive genre-defying exhibition you will embark on a once in a lifetime adventure through the cosmos to explore visions of the future through the science of today.

Throughout this dynamic and interactive voyage, you will be placed at the heart of a dramatic science fiction story. Guided by artificial intelligence of alien origin, you will board and explore a unique spaceship, scout an alien planet, and investigate how scientists and science fiction creators have imagined and built new worlds to better understand our own.

As a thank you for being a subscriber you have priority booking until 09.00 on Thursday 2 December this includes access to 15% off Early Bird tickets. Know a science fiction fan? Don't miss out on our limited Science Fiction Christmas gift bundles <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzI5NzMyXzEyODc1MTBfNzI1MQ%26l%3D61476666-f751-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLDB%253AScienceFictionScotland%252C30.11.21%26utm_term%3DWordFly%2520%26utm_content%3Dversion_A%26promo%3D24309&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C9fd170ea3a1d4d78829108d9b41b8669%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637738852584278370%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=6hl%2FX9kKgWUI9QVRZGDXD%2BSEo5wD5nrSHBdfUq1HtTE%3D&reserved=0> .

Subject: Brambles Thank you for Applying!
Body:
Dear Rory,

Thank you for applying to the Data Analyst opportunity at Brambles. 

If you are selected for an interview or further information is needed, you will be contacted.

Otherwise, please check for future position openings and reapply at https://careers.brambles.com/


Check your Application Center <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbrambleskf.tal.net%2Fvx%2Flang-en-GB%2Fmobile-0%2Fappcentre-1%2Fbrand-4%2Fuser-2427%2Fxf-ab27a60993b2%2Fcandidate%2Fapplication%2F2512&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cb0ff4c5330604e56daa708d9b4c8729e%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637739596215389622%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C2000&sdata=joZOfmbyA%2FHm5KB9auliT9KDuc5d6U44vZ%2BpiXFCabU%3D&reserved=0>  regularly for updates to your application.

As a reminder, your username is rory.mccabe@ofgem.gov.uk.

We appreciate your interest in Brambles.



Kind Regards,
Korn Ferry on behalf of Brambles

Recruiting Team

Subject: Brambles Application Update
Body:
Hi Rory,

Thank you for considering a career opportunity with Brambles for the Data Analyst position. We have had a very high level of interest in the role, so we thank you for your patience whilst we have been reviewing all the applications.

After careful consideration, we regret we are unable to further consider you for this particular role as we have other candidates who are more closely aligned to our selection criteria. However, we will keep your resume for consideration for future opportunities.

Please check our career site for the latest openings at https://careeres.brambles.com/ 
You can join our Talent Network to receive alerts of suitable opportunities.

Regards,



Kind Regards,
Korn Ferry on behalf of Brambles

Recruiting Team

Subject: Altitude Christmas Special: Die Hard 2: Myth-busting a Christmas Classic ??
Body:
View in browser <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nats.aero%2Fecard%2Fbrowser%3FmsgID%3Datb007l8zj8j47rs78ig8vz9aked5zlv%26rcpt%3Da7165184a2659f1dbec3a63fb8413a0d&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd5dbf25cc37447b3f4cc08d9ba862cd5%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637745908630364820%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=PIg8Wn9Ej4CDYVC3mdgaIupil2vUHPlaIQSeTiIN%2BK0%3D&reserved=0> 

 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nats.aero%2Fecard%2Flink%3Fid%3Dx7thrh4a4h7hh2rnqo70v3kz7w9bh8y9%26msgID%3Datb007l8zj8j47rs78ig8vz9aked5zlv%26rcptID%3Da7165184a2659f1dbec3a63fb8413a0d%26key%3Dc22d0f70a8af03222de27cb2caa42fa2&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd5dbf25cc37447b3f4cc08d9ba862cd5%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637745908630364820%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=NLdZv4NCpM6BykrZAOTAR2gjCEYcaee948cv6dyN2V4%3D&reserved=0>  

Join us for

Altitude?– Christmas Special: Die Hard 2: Myth-busting a Christmas Classic

23rd December, 15.00 GMT, LIVE




Aside from being one of the greatest Christmas movies of all time, the timeless classic Die Hard 2 also features some of the closest depictions of air traffic control yet committed to celluloid. The story of how a terrorist group manages to commandeer an entire airport on Christmas Eve, while a man in a big jumper crawls through the baggage handling system to stop them, is a tale for the ages.

But how close is it to real life? Has any controller ever been told to “stack ‘em, pack ‘em and rack ‘em?” Can you change sea level on the Instrument Landing System from an old church? What really sets off the airport metal detectors first? And most importantly, is Die Hard really a Christmas movie?

Join NATS Heathrow air traffic controllers and Die Hard mega fans, Ady Dolan and Chris Jones alongside commercial airline pilot, Lyndsay McGregor, as we unpick fact from glorious fiction.

Subject: Approved holiday request
Body:
Please be advised that your Manager has authorised your holiday from 22/12/2021 to 23/12/2021.

Regards
HR

Season's Greetings from the Science Museum


Keep warm and explore the wonders of the museum this winter


From new exhibitions to timeless classics, there is so much to see and do for all fans of science and beyond. Avoid the frantic Christmas rush and enjoy a whole host of inspiring and engaging stories of extraordinary human achievement and technological advances.
