Join us for

Altitude?– Christmas Special: Die Hard 2: Myth-busting a Christmas Classic

23rd December, 15.00 GMT, LIVE




Aside from being one of the greatest Christmas movies of all time, the timeless classic Die Hard 2 also features some of the closest depictions of air traffic control yet committed to celluloid. The story of how a terrorist group manages to commandeer an entire airport on Christmas Eve, while a man in a big jumper crawls through the baggage handling system to stop them, is a tale for the ages.

But how close is it to real life? Has any controller ever been told to “stack ‘em, pack ‘em and rack ‘em?” Can you change sea level on the Instrument Landing System from an old church? What really sets off the airport metal detectors first? And most importantly, is Die Hard really a Christmas movie?

Join NATS Heathrow air traffic controllers and Die Hard mega fans, Ady Dolan and Chris Jones alongside commercial airline pilot, Lyndsay McGregor, as we unpick fact from glorious fiction.

Register Here <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nats.aero%2Fecard%2Flink%3Fid%3Dx7thrh4a4h7hh2rnqo70v3kz7w9bh8y9%26msgID%3Dze9v1bjpgd4npj8x5mrxyck8ar5prlkb%26rcptID%3Da7165184a2659f1dbec3a63fb8413a0d%26key%3D98f6886c2dd3c451fbf31e7ec1627141&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Ca76323be503d4cd1c61108d9c0be1a45%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637752744984843317%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=SB294bRPChApfl5CzO3uOu0qPnpa4eGQFF%2BrTKrMbMM%3D&reserved=0> 

Yippee ki yay air traffickers.

NATS

Subject: Special guest announced: Die Hard 2: Myth-busting a Christmas Classic ??
Body:

Join us for

Altitude?– Christmas Special: Die Hard 2: Myth-busting a Christmas Classic

23rd December, 15.00 GMT, LIVE




We are delighted to announce a special guest appearance by the screenwriter of Die Hard and Die Hard 2, Steven de Souza. Hear from the man behind some of the most iconic characters and lines in Hollywood history about his inspiration, and the true story behind Windsor Airlines...

But how close is the movie to real life? Has any controller ever been told to “stack ‘em, pack ‘em and rack ‘em?” Can you change sea level on the Instrument Landing System from an old church? What really sets off the airport metal detectors first? And most importantly, is Die Hard really a Christmas movie?

Alongside Steven, join NATS Heathrow air traffic controllers and Die Hard mega fans, Ady Dolan and Chris Jones alongside airline pilot, Lyndsay McGregor, as we unpick fact from glorious fiction.

Register Here <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nats.aero%2Fecard%2Flink%3Fid%3Dx7thrh4a4h7hh2rnqo70v3kz7w9bh8y9%26msgID%3D6k02ar8w4bvt41qj5wcr5nnnldd898be%26rcptID%3Da7165184a2659f1dbec3a63fb8413a0d%26key%3D66e1ee7965246f9f731158a410a56bf5&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C513837202c89485cd6d208d9c3e42a53%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637756206990416527%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=DyF1UMgGhSUynnWYbbEbi0hICaXEQ9eFiKR1iKPCfUk%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Data Scientists
Body:
Hi Rory, 
 
I appreciate you will no doubt have many introductions from recruiters on a daily basis, but I feel I have an offer that is a bit different here.
 
I'm a Data Science Recruitment Consultant that has studied Python & R programming languages whilst at University, about to embark on further training in Data Science - It's a huge passion of mine. The reason for my contact is to discuss the potential to help you with recruitment for Data Science professionals as not only do I specialise in this market, but I also have a well connected candidate base that extends outside of just a recruiters professional network.
 
I'm working with quite a few permanent candidates currently, I've included profiles of 4 candidates to see if they would be of interest to you and future team's goals?
 
CLD03

*	5 years experience as a Data Scientist, with experience working in various sectors such as AI and energy (Petroleum)
*	Strongest technologies include: 

	*	Python & SQL 
	*	Data Visualisation 
	*	Machine Learning
	*	Tableau, Git 
	*	TensorFlow, Keras, AWS 

*	Recently finished designing a solution to develop a new scalable customer identification tool using random forest and NLP algorithms with Python and SQL to increase projected yearly revenue by £10M+ 
*	PhD - Petroleum Geoscience   

 
CLD01

*	8 years experience as a Data Scientist, with prior experience working in Data Modelling & Data focussed positions. 
*	Strongest technologies include: 

	*	Python - expert 
	*	SQL
	*	Pandas 
	*	Sklearn 
	*	Tensorflow 
	*	AWS 

*	Currently manages Machine Learning deliverables for a FTSE100 financial client 
*	BSc, MSc - Mathematics 

 
CLD04

*	3 years past experience as a Data Scientist working in the digital sector until most recently completing his masters. 
*	Strongest technologies include: 

	*	Languages: Python, Java, C 
	*	Machine Learning & Deep Learning: PyTorch, SciKit-Learn, Numpy, Pandas ? Data Management: SQL, Google BigQuery 
	*	Data Visualisation: Tableau, Matplotlib, Seaborn 
	*	Backend Development & Cloud: Docker, AWS, Azure 

*	Recently finished his MSc in Computer Science with courses related to Machine Learning and Database Systems 

 
CLD05

*	2 years past experience as a Data Scientist with past experience working in risk modelling and machine learning developments. 
*	Strongest technologies include: 

	*	Python (OOP, scikit-learn, Keras) 
	*	R (ML stack) 
	*	SQL (BigQuery, Redshift, Oracle) 
	*	AWS

*	Currently designing and undertaking data collection activities to acquire ML training datasets 
*	Developed a mixture of regulatory statistical models and industry pioneering machine learning solutions at various banks and financial institutions with the use of Python, R, SAS and SQL. 
*	BSc Mathematics with Astronomy   

 
Would you be interested in any of these candidates?
 
Best wishes
Chloe Davy

--

 <https://recruiterflow.com/email-tracking/bb7856e1ce62d35524452d5df1e95511.gif>

Subject: BSL Taster Session
Body:
Hi All

 

We have a fantastic opportunity to participate in a one-hour British Sign Language (BSL) taster session via Teams exclusively for the DDI Team. BSL is now recognised as part of the national language and part of the curriculum in schools it is also the preferred language among the deaf and hard of hearing community.  Of course, it not just for the deaf and hard of hearing, it’s for everyone to use, as its now more than ever around us all the time.  Trying to secure a tutor is like gold dust and to get one for free is nigh on impossible so please try your best to attend.  It will be fun and informal; it will boost your communication skills and if nothing else you will give your brain a good workout.

 

Hope to see you there

 

Thanks

 

Linsay

There’s no question that moving to the cloud makes it easier for your business to continue innovating and stay agile. However, migrating your security practice to the cloud can feel like a lot to navigate on your own.

  

Wouldn’t it be nice if someone told you what your cloud security strategy was missing?

  

Fortinet has teamed up with Amazon Web Services (AWS) to help you embrace the cloud with confidence.

 

Read this eBook <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fresponse.insightsforprofessionals.co.uk%2Flink%2Fjy3wq5dtc3asg6tixb88w1jue3ug4pnngp4ro11qxy4iqsmkpf1y&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbb95110883684464161f08d9d5c391df%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637775858533804866%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=DQNjE3nuiilYe762ra3%2BRz8hopxgohgWYtBAFfRhOKQ%3D&reserved=0>  to learn more.

How to Accelerate Your Business' Digital Initiatives Ahead of 2022 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fresponse.insightsforprofessionals.co.uk%2Flink%2Fktes1qdnkt8rhqkxj388w1jue3ug4pnngp4ro11qxy4iqsmkpf1y&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbb95110883684464161f08d9d5c391df%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637775858533804866%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=V6BOGRPwXsVbawsAIeZ4GGMTLgE%2Bse5780E9KKdjAtw%3D&reserved=0> 

 

In today's competitive landscape, the brands that are creating exceptional digital experiences for their customers are witnessing the biggest additions to their bottom line.

                      

Increasingly, brands are turning to technologies such as agile content management systems (CMSes) as a means to deliver the kind of omnichannel, flexible, and personalised experiences their customers are looking for.

                 

This Forrester report <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fresponse.insightsforprofessionals.co.uk%2Flink%2Fktes1qdnkt8rhqkxj388w1jue3ug4pnngp4ro11qxy4iqsmkpf1y&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbb95110883684464161f08d9d5c391df%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637775858533804866%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=V6BOGRPwXsVbawsAIeZ4GGMTLgE%2Bse5780E9KKdjAtw%3D&reserved=0>  uncovers how an agile CMS can accelerate your digital initiatives, with thorough evaluations of what each vendor can offer your business.

How Secure is your DDoS Protection? <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fresponse.insightsforprofessionals.co.uk%2Flink%2Fea4wsk31cezse1ncj388w1jue3ug4pnngp4ro11qxy4iqsmkpf1y&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbb95110883684464161f08d9d5c391df%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637775858533804866%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=gin%2FkkAPsuL%2BtRAKltbBchcgXCt%2BpD3j7bOumEcfszk%3D&reserved=0> 

 

Much of our world today lives in the cloud, employees are remote, and applications are hosted in IaaS environments.

            

As we expand the network perimeter beyond the four walls of the data center, we continue to increase our reliance on the internet. However, DDoS attacks are growing in frequency, complexity and geographical distribution.

Sooner or later, everyone gets audited. The best defence is using Software Asset Management strategies to collect all relevant data beforehand, using your people, processes, and the right tools effectively. SAM ensures you're buying the right number of licenses while remaining compliant with the license terms and conditions.

                                                                             

Download this guide <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fresponse.insightsforprofessionals.co.uk%2Flink%2Fpb8fe45dqj3z1oumpb88w1jue3ug4pnngp4ro11qxy4iqsmkpf1y&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cbb95110883684464161f08d9d5c391df%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637775858533959757%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=hs0YihCPdt39PUKso%2BUwgjcLbh2SwYYriU3kDNAsVqc%3D&reserved=0>  to discover insights from USU's own consultants and experts, some of whom have worked on both sides of an audit. You'll learn how to:

*	Respond to a software license audit letter
*	Gather the right data for the audit submission
*	Find potentially cost-saving entitlements
*	High Risk Vendors in Profile: Microsoft, SAP, IBM, Oracle, Quest, Microfocus
*	Use the right data in negotiations to avoid penalties and fees

Quickly learn Azure cloud computing skills – get the audiobook

Get started with Azure in 21 bite-sized lessons. The popular eBook Learn Azure in a Month of Lunches is now available as a free audiobook. Follow step-by-step instructions to build your first project in Azure and be productive immediately. When you finish the lessons, you’ll be well on your way to Azure mastery. Learn how to:

*	Use core Azure infrastructure and platform services – including how to choose which service for which task.
*	Plan appropriately for availability, scale and security while considering cost and performance.
*	Work with key technologies, including Kubernetes and serverless computing, AI and machine learning and the Internet of Things. 

Reinforce your new skills with labs and exercises, using project files that you can access in GitHub. Also download the free eBook Learn Azure in a Month of Lunches <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Femails.microsoft.com%2FMTU3LUdRRS0zODIAAAF_oNGYCkL5Ge-3Lh-oBajkIm4vi87Nrs-Sq4WqokSFGloNYOk8efwZgX2J6DhK_yX5Uu9ESP4%3D&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4a5303ab55d44b51f51808d97bfe21db%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637677153686754036%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=5LV4D3KKTQ6HbByiatRMuyK7%2FRLW3cwaEyr46tUIGNE%3D&reserved=0> .

Subject: RE: Final week handover [OFFICIAL Internal Only]
Body:
Hi Nick,

 

I’ve been documenting Covid and contingency RFIs, rest of Retail RFIs, ED2 and Miscellaneous (including SoLR) documents separately and passing them over with Covid scripts to Sergio at daily handover sessions.

 

Currently, the draft copies are on my H: drive but I’ll put them on K: or your new SharePoint for the team to pick up.

 

In parallel, I’ve talked to Monica (for retail) and Chris H (for ED2) to discuss last steps from my point of view and I’ve introduced Sergio to Laura/Natasha to discuss the C31E work although I think their current timeline is a little tight to take on new work.

 

I am catching up with Chris, Liz and Sergio tomorrow to make sure there’s nothing else,

Rory

 

From: Nick Blewden 
Sent: 17 January 2022 15:00
To: Rory McCabe <Rory.McCabe@ofgem.gov.uk>
Cc: Helen Crooks <Helen.Crooks@ofgem.gov.uk>
Subject: Final week handover

 

Hi Rory,

 

As we enter your last week at Ofgem, we are keen to ensure handover of your activities as smoothly as possible especially as you are key to several of these areas.

 

Can you let me know the status of your handover activities and documentation so far for example:

*	New RFIs
*	SOLR process
*	ED2 process
*	COVD RFI process

Please provide me any links to documentation you have already done please so I have it on reference.

 

Thanks

 

Nick

 

Nick Blewden

Chief Analytics Officer

Data and Digital Insights 

Analysis and Assurance Directorate

 

 

 

 

OFFICIAL-InternalOnly

 

[Internal Only]

Subject: BAR process not necessary [OFFICIAL Internal Only]
Body:
Hi Nick,

 

Can you confirm there’s no need for the BAR process as I’m moving into a job with no direct government contact?

 

Thanks,

Rory

 

From: People Centre 
Sent: 13 January 2022 15:44
To: Rory McCabe <Rory.McCabe@ofgem.gov.uk>
Cc: Nick Blewden <Nick.Blewden@ofgem.gov.uk>

Thank you for sending back the signed letter.

Subject: Altitude episode 13: Dealing with Emergencies: The story of BAW38 ????
Body:
View in browser <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nats.aero%2Fecard%2Fbrowser%3FmsgID%3D3ko45vldxn71xsp454xgs2yvg8pxt8j2%26rcpt%3Da7165184a2659f1dbec3a63fb8413a0d&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C99a55a0584244feb8b7708d9d9f4dc33%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637780467963133608%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=4p9bLrkKyKb4RTfpzZst6i3iprbmAdJPTaFlIZIh6Wo%3D&reserved=0> 

 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nats.aero%2Fecard%2Flink%3Fid%3Du8a701w01pui5nee0o23if4le436mtyv%26msgID%3D3ko45vldxn71xsp454xgs2yvg8pxt8j2%26rcptID%3Da7165184a2659f1dbec3a63fb8413a0d%26key%3D9d914a8981780de0d83aca6b51fb2bdb&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C99a55a0584244feb8b7708d9d9f4dc33%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637780467963133608%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=BK4OpEIku7KCty7z1lwmkpeblPOLqMZbh%2FR95%2FWimTM%3D&reserved=0>  

Join us for

Altitude?– Episode?13:? Dealing with emergencies: The story of BAW38

26th January, 15.00 BST, LIVE




17 January 2008, flight BAW38 crash landed short of the runway at Heathrow Airport following a total loss of power to both engines. Remarkably there were no fatalities, but it remains the most serious commercial aircraft accident in the UK in recent years.

The fact that it did not end in tragedy is testament both to how incredibly safe modern aviation has become, and to the training and professionalism of all the individuals involved.

But what is it really like to be faced with an unfolding emergency? Can any amount of training equip someone with the skill, confidence, and courage to do what’s needed in the midst of a potential disaster?

Join us to hear from two of the controllers in the tower that day about what would be the most memorable, pressurised and emotionally charged few minutes of their lives. Find out how events unfolded and the legacy the incident has had on their lives, careers and wider industry.

We’ll also be discussing the wider aspects of safety. What helps create a strong safety culture and why training for emergencies remains a vital tool despite the aviation industry’s impressive safety record.

Register here. <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nats.aero%2Fecard%2Flink%3Fid%3Du8a701w01pui5nee0o23if4le436mtyv%26msgID%3D3ko45vldxn71xsp454xgs2yvg8pxt8j2%26rcptID%3Da7165184a2659f1dbec3a63fb8413a0d%26key%3D9d914a8981780de0d83aca6b51fb2bdb&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C99a55a0584244feb8b7708d9d9f4dc33%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637780467963133608%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=BK4OpEIku7KCty7z1lwmkpeblPOLqMZbh%2FR95%2FWimTM%3D&reserved=0>

Subject: Lewis [OFFICIAL Internal Only]
Body:
Hi Monica,

 

Sorry to hear you’re losing Lewis too; I only heard earlier today!

 

I’ll give you a call Thursday (to ask why you didn’t bring the Spanish weather back with you) as I assume you are off Friday.

 

All the best,

Rory

 

[Internal Only]

Body:

Subject: Senior Consultant - Data Engineer / Analyst, Your recent application
Body:
Hi Rory,


Thank you for applying for the position of Senior Consultant - Data Engineer / Analyst with us. Although your application won't be progressing at this time, we would love to get your feedback on our recruitment process so we can continue to improve candidate experience and ensure we are providing future applicants with an accessible, efficient, and enjoyable process. 



Please complete the short survey below and thank you again for your application. We wish you all the best in your job search.

Applicant Feedback Survey <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforms.office.com%2FPages%2FResponsePage.aspx%3Fid%3Dfa-Hi0eGx02N9F9pogEbtb2Rn9mZz55Mqe_ABwx-4NhUMVUwSEo1QUQ1OVNGMEwzRlVVVlMxQkhCNC4u&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cdd42051e7b9b4264a45408d9db7183b2%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782102848977878%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=yrQbBZ1WYmZ4ymxREZulfVSO3tm%2FYWpFqhpcKhq67WE%3D&reserved=0> 


Kind Regards,


Sopra Steria Recruitment Team

Subject: Fascinating events and unique experiences waiting for you at the Science Museum
Body:
Plan your next Science Museum visit |  View in browser <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D110cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=9xNULx1AiO24mmNkW%2BFQnMSEY9abR%2FlPNef4aqQYghw%3D&reserved=0>  

 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D120cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=0OygG%2FftxQ8yS66OoWPYUTVFGpeB%2BC5qX0uLlygaLBg%3D&reserved=0>  
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D130cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=1l8L49Il1DIjwXoE9Nz2cgHudqX9wDRU0TQ5pLT6El4%3D&reserved=0>  

Book your trip to the Science Museum


Spring into action and plan ahead


Whenever you're planning to visit over the next few months, we've got you covered as tickets to the Science Museum are now available till 27 May.

As 2022 get's underway, we look forward to welcoming you back into the museum. We strongly recommend that you book in advance to avoid disappointment. 

Plan your visit <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D140cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=vexZ%2Bo9iChL8GyKb%2BbDDHnHcqtt7KqG6sFkOvxBvYtY%3D&reserved=0>  
________________________________

 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D150cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=OKhnidcOChGuyNVdnlbNa%2FaRC30q%2By5s28GEeNUbrj8%3D&reserved=0>  

Amazônia


Last chance to see this breath-taking exhibition


Brought to life by the amazing work of renowned photographer Sebastião Salgado, Amazônia <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D150cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=OKhnidcOChGuyNVdnlbNa%2FaRC30q%2By5s28GEeNUbrj8%3D&reserved=0>  celebrates the indigenous peoples and varied landscapes of the Brazilian rainforest.

This photo exhibition will be closing in March, so be sure to get your tickets booked before it's too late - this is an experience that you don't want to miss.

For those who are unable to visit the Science Museum before the exhibition's closure - our friends at the Science and Industry Museum <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D160cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=aOLpn%2BqwyB%2FHV1fhN5UV0Y%2BjhaxdxkpT946FRPZUokE%3D&reserved=0>  in Manchester will be displaying this collection from summer 2022.

Book Amazônia now <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D150cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=OKhnidcOChGuyNVdnlbNa%2FaRC30q%2By5s28GEeNUbrj8%3D&reserved=0>  
 <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D170cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=K29hTAjPop%2FiTgOWNKPZB8FEZ5ICuNe3kSPH3T8Ifzo%3D&reserved=0>  

Fascinating upcoming events


Attend virtually or in-person


In the coming months, we have a series of events that support our current feature exhibitions Amazônia <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D150cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=OKhnidcOChGuyNVdnlbNa%2FaRC30q%2By5s28GEeNUbrj8%3D&reserved=0>  and Ancient Greeks: Science and Wisdom <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D180cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=924Wq5G5mffFQV%2BYp24z3jhEZx189v11abRco0HiQJo%3D&reserved=0> .

You can join us in our IMAX cinema for a screening of the stunning The Salt of the Earth <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D190cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=cjWo4TGFGf7T2KacD8w%2BNO4ZBN7iyQZwoqSHz0BmaVE%3D&reserved=0> , an Oscar-nominated documentary about celebrated photographer Sebastião Salgado, followed by a Q&A with Salgado himself.

Stephen Hawking at Work


Opens 10 February for a limited time


Explore incredible objects, including some never seen by the public before, from Professor Stephen Hawking’s office in this new, free display.  

Stephen Hawking at Work <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D1b0cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=ZKzmda14b5sLLOjnQxJ1kBEgdC2IN%2Ff3oHxyp4whqpU%3D&reserved=0>  will give an insight into the working life of the?world-renowned theoretical?physicist. Space seminar series


Our new multidisciplinary series on space exploration


This first season <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fe.wordfly.com%2Fclick%3Fsid%3DOTY1XzMwNTIxXzEyODc1MTBfNzI0Nw%26l%3D1c0cb56d-d779-ec11-a82d-0050569dd3d9%26utm_source%3DEmail%26utm_medium%3DNewsletter%26utm_campaign%3DLJA%253A%255BREADY%255DJanWhat%27sOnB(ACC)20.01.22%26utm_term%3DWordfly%26utm_content%3Dversion_B%26promo%3D25366&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7Cd510f79541544f5d948708d9dbfbeac3%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782697297884410%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=M4yGzsTvT9LF8qmQT8xwFOTSpmqLGPqCqf6SEZLyVNM%3D&reserved=0>  will focus on Japan with subsequent ones looking at South East Asia and China.

Subject: Less than one week to go...Altitude episode 13: Dealing with Emergencies: The story of BAW38 ????

Join us for

Altitude?– Episode?13:? Dealing with emergencies: The story of BAW38

26th January, 15.00 GMT, LIVE




17 January 2008, flight BAW38 crash landed short of the runway at Heathrow Airport following a total loss of power to both engines. Remarkably there were no fatalities, but it remains the most serious commercial aircraft accident in the UK in recent years.

But what is it really like to be faced with an unfolding emergency? Can any amount of training equip someone with the skill, confidence, and courage to do what’s needed in the midst of a potential disaster?

Join us to hear from two of the controllers in the tower that day about what would be the most memorable, pressurised and emotionally charged few minutes of their lives. Find out how events unfolded and the legacy the incident has had on their lives, careers and wider industry.

Register here. <https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nats.aero%2Fecard%2Flink%3Fid%3Du8a701w01pui5nee0o23if4le436mtyv%26msgID%3D0ucyhukx66nyvhfi3h90bmdyei2qou8p%26rcptID%3Da7165184a2659f1dbec3a63fb8413a0d%26key%3Db5033933a2b8594627e1960f513e218d&data=04%7C01%7Crory.mccabe%40ofgem.gov.uk%7C4ca78b001b174be02c1408d9dc294874%7C185562ad39bc48408e40be6216340c52%7C0%7C0%7C637782892128524169%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=FMjriJwyrOgEpUBmKUNJhnlPoJsUK1T26rEU9Sg%2BeUE%3D&reserved=0>

Cc: Chris Olsen <Chris.Olsen@ofgem.gov.uk <mailto:Chris.Olsen@ofgem.gov.uk> >
Subject: RIIO ED2 BPDT files [OFFICIAL Internal Only]

 

Note any scripts I created late last year for new (M27, M28, M29) or changed tabs (CV1, CV6) should be in the latest folders at N:\NPC-DS Project\ED\data\gather.

 

I suggest this is where the guys (Chris Haworth, Tim Mellor and Tom Roberts) share their changes before updating the repo.

 

Currently there are the five master scripts (as above), three older version strip scripts (not needed), 105 tab scripts (including three new) and two subfolders (cache and tmp – not needed)

 

The corresponding metadata files are on the N: drive.

 

Rory

 

[Internal Only]
